body_html:
Heya @zhangwewenwen. Are you running into this problem in a Singularity container? Did you run your container with the --nv option?

--nv will find the appropriate nvidia libraries on the host system (including libcudo.so*) and bind mount them into your container at runtime. This will give you access to the host system GPU.

This is very similar to how nvidia-docker works afaik.

body:
Heya @zhangwewenwen.  Are you running into this problem in a Singularity container?  Did you run your container with the `--nv` option?  

`--nv` will find the appropriate nvidia libraries on the host system (including `libcudo.so*`) and bind mount them into your container at runtime.  This will give you access to the host system GPU.

This is very similar to how nvidia-docker works afaik.
